snippet: An elegant home at 775 Park Avenue, lovingly restored in homage to the building’s architect, is poised to enter the market for the first time in 26 years.
abstract: Restored three-level penthouse at 775 Park Avenue is set to enter the market at $40 million.
lead_paragraph: An elegant home at 775 Park Avenue, lovingly restored in homage to the building’s architect, is poised to enter the market for the first time in 26 years.

headline.main: Park Avenue Penthouse in a Rosario Candela Building
